Sessionized Data

Flight data contains time, carrier, origin, destination and the plane that made the flight (tail_num). Take the flight data and sessionize it by carrier and date. Compute statistics and the session, plane and flight level. Retain the original flight events.

explore 'malloy-data.faa.flights'
  fields
    flight_count is count()
| reduce:  [carrier : 'WN', dep_time : '2002-03-03']
  dep_time.`date`
  carrier
  flight_count
  plane is (reduce top 20
    tail_num
    flight_count
    flights is (reduce order by 2
      tail_num
      dep_minute is dep_time.minute
      origin
      destination
    )
  )
dep_​time_​date carrier flight_​count plane
2002-03-03 WN 7
tail_​num flight_​count flights
UNKNOW 7
tail_​num dep_​minute origin destination
UNKNOW 2002-03-03 00:00 LAX PHX
UNKNOW 2002-03-03 00:00 PHX LAX
UNKNOW 2002-03-03 00:00 HOU DAL
UNKNOW 2002-03-03 00:00 STL MDW
UNKNOW 2002-03-03 00:00 MDW STL
